How does the paper suggest enhancing the: By increasing the size of the training dataset.
By using more powerful computational hardware.
What challenge does the paper acknowledg: The high computational cost of running DL models.
The lack of interest from the scientific community.
The difficulty in obtaining regulatory approval for AI-designed antibodies.
What is the primary focus of the paper r: The use of AI in antibody design and development.
The application of AI in drug delivery systems.
The role of AI in vaccine development.
The use of AI in protein folding prediction.
What is the role of ESM-1b in the contex: It aids in ML-guided Antigenic Evolution Prediction (MLAEP) for developing binders against virus variants.
It predicts the 3D structure of SARS-CoV-2 proteins.
It sequences the entire genome of SARS-CoV-2.
It identifies potential drug targets within the SARS-CoV-2 genome.
